tool_description: Retrieves current inventory levels for specified products across multiple warehouses or locations.

product_ids.description: List of product SKUs or IDs to check inventory levels for

location_filter.description: Filter by specific warehouse or store locations

include_reserved.description: Whether to include reserved/allocated stock in totals

error_messages: Product ID not found: One or more product IDs do not exist in the catalog. Verify product SKUs are correct.
Location not found: Specified location does not exist. Check location codes are valid.
Database connection error: Unable to retrieve stock data. Check system connectivity and try again.
usage: Provide product_ids array to get current stock levels. Optionally filter by location_filter and set include_reserved to include allocated inventory.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs that were checked

current_stock_levels.description: Current inventory quantities corresponding to each product ID

last_updated.description: Timestamp when stock levels were last updated
